[\[1b.1\]{D2591}]@##/_/byang chub kyi sems bsgom pa/_'phags pa 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/bdag med gnyis nyid bde gshegs mi rtog ye shes chos dbyings
[\[1b.2\]]sku brnyes pa/_/kun gyi rang bzhin zhi ba 'di la gsal zhing bla med lam mchog ste/_/mi ldog sa la sogs te dbang bcu rgyal ba kun dang gcig brnyes pa/_/gnas gsum mnyam nyid de la mtshan
[\[1b.3\]]med yid kyis rab tu dad pas mos/_/ston pa 'jig rten sgron mar gyur pa kun gyis mtshungs par rab bsngags pa/_/chos la chos kyi snying por gyur pa 'jam dpal gzhon nu snying po nyid/_/bde
[\[1b.4\]]gshegs ma lus yum du gyur pas rgyal ba kun gyi lam gcig go/_/tshul khrims la sogs pha rol phyin lam spyod pa rgya mtsho'i gzhir gyur pa/_/rnam dag byang chub sems kyi ngang tshul bsgoms
[\[1b.5\]]dang yon tan khyad par ni/_/blo ldan nam zhig sems kyi dam pa de ni mngon du gyur pa na/_/de la sku gsum mchog tu gyur par chos kyi sku zhes rgyal bas gsungs/_/shes byed dam par gyur pa shes rab
[\[2a\]]
[\[2a.1\]]spyan zhes kyang ni de la bya/_/rdo rje rtse mo mchog nyid mi rtog ye shes de yang de nyid do/_/ji snyed 'phags pa'i rnam grol chos su bsnyad pa de dag thams cad kyang /_/byang chub sems nyid rdzogs pas de
[\[2a.2\]]yi yon tan de dag de las byung /_/'phags pa'i rigs chen 'chi med byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang /_/de med mi 'byung de phyir de ni rnam grol mchog gi lam nyid do/_/de nas kun du rdo rje sems dpa' ci 'drar
[\[2a.3\]]bsgom par bya bar 'gyur/_/pha zhing shes dka' drang srong chen po'i lam 'di mi rtog rtog las 'das/_/brtag par dka' zhing bstan par dka' la brjod pa'i tha snyad rnams dang bral/_/tshig gis mi phebs gzhan
[\[2a.4\]]dang byis pa kun gyi spyod yul ma yin yang /_/ston pa nges pa'i lung dang bla ma dam pa rnams kyi gdams ngag de nyid don 'dir blta/_/mngon sum la sogs rgyu yi dngos po 'jig cing grub pa'i mtha' dpyod pa/_/de nyid rtog
[\[2a.5\]]pa'i rgyun 'brangs dpyod yul tshad mar bzhag nas blo yis 'jig byed de/_/rtog mtha' med phyir dpyod mtha' med de snying po med na tshad mar gang /_/de phyir 'jig rten brtags pa'i tha snyad rnal 'byor lam 'dir mi dgos
[\[2b\]]
[\[2b.1\]]so/_/dngos po mtha' yi rgyu ni lo rgyus dag las lam 'dir brtag par bya/_/skye bo kun gyi sems la mngon snang phyi nang grags pa'i chos 'di ni/_/'dzin pa drug gi ji ltar mthong zhing brtags pa de ltar ma yin 'khrul/_/rang gi rtog pas myos shing gzung ba de bzhin bden gyur na/_/de
[\[2b.2\]]dag dngos po med rtogs dgra bcom 'dra bar grol 'gyur ba yi rigs/_/de dag dus dgras 'joms dang sdug bsngal nyen las des 'khrul mngon par 'gyur/_/gzhan du skye mched sgo nas rig pa de dag tshad mar gyur na ni/_/de nyid tshad mar gyur pas 'phags pa'i lam de su la dgos mi 'gyur/_/lam de
[\[2b.3\]]rnam grol lam du bstan cing dbang po'i shes pas mi thar te/_/sdug bsngal 'ga' yang mi 'jil rnam rig shes te nyon mongs 'byung ba'i gnas/_/de phyir skye bos mthong ba de dag 'khrul par mngon zhes rgyal bas gsungs/_/de na de las 'di dag 'khrul pa'i dbang gis ji ltar snang bar 'gyur zhe
[\[2b.4\]]na/_/kun du rtog can yan lag ma yin kun du rtog pas rtsol med nyams/_/blo gros phyin ci log tu gyur cing ma rig rkyen gyi dbang song bas/_/sems dang sems las byung ba de nyid lus gsum don du snang ba yin/_/'du byed sna tshogs dag gis bag chags bsags las gang goms mthu
[\[2b.5\]]brtas tshe/_/sems nyid yul dang lus 'drar snang ba rus pas gang ba bzhin du snang /_/bag chags bsags pa'i rgyun la dmigs skyes yid la brtags pa'i bdag med pa/_/'du byed mthu yis bsgribs shing phra ba ma mthong de las rnam rig skye/_/rgyun dang bcas pa'i sems kyi mthu ni ma
[\[2b.6\]]rtogs rtog pa'i rjes 'brangs nas/_/de las zag bcas rang bzhin rtog pas bdag dang chos rnams rgyas par byed/_/ldan par 'byung ba shin tu phra bar rgyu ba de ni ma mthong las/_/bdag tu lta la sogs pa mu stegs lta ba sna tshogs skye zhing thar pa rtog_/sems 'di las rnams mtha' yas gnas
[\[2b.7\]]gyur bag chags mtha' med nges pa med/_/bag chags brtas shing sad par byed pa'i rkyen yang rnam pa sna tshogs te/_/rkyen 'gas bag chags 'ga' zhig smin nas mi yi rgyud kyi lus snang ba/_/rkyen gzhan dag gis bag chags gzhan sad byas tshe 'gyur ba'i mthu mthong nas/_/dbang phyug la
[\[3a\]]
[\[3a.1\]]sogs byed par 'dod de nyes pa lam de mi zhi grol mi 'gyur/_/rnal 'byor lam slad the tshom rgyun 'di phra ba ma rtogs skyes/_/bdag tu brtags pas bsgribs te 'phags pa'i rigs dang rnam par bral/_/chos su btags pas sdug bsngal sna tshogs 'byung zhing ngan song
[\[3a.2\]]srid par 'gyur/_/rnam shes de yang 'du byed rgyun la mtshan ma tha dad 'dzin pas na/_/las kyi khyad par dag gis brgyad du snang gi rigs la tha dad med/_/de phyir sems kyi skad cig dang po de la lus dang chos kun gnas/_/de la bsam pa zhen pa'i phyir na phyi ma phyi ma de la snang /_/rang sems rgyun las 'phags
[\[3a.3\]]pa skye bo chos ni gzhan na yod ma yin/_/rgyud drug rigs las de yang sna tshogs de dang rang gi ting 'dzin no/_/sems rgyun de las phyogs kyang cung zad med pas gcig la brten med de/_/de la phyogs med phyir na mtha' yas zhing rnams bdag gi lus/_/bdag gi lus ni mtha' yas zhing dang
[\[3a.4\]]skye bo'i lus su rab snang yang /_/sems dang bag chags gcig min tha dad ma yin brtag par rab tu dka'/_/'di kun rten cing 'brel 'byung tshul te skye dang 'gag par 'gyur zhes pa/_/tshig pa'i sa bon bzhin du med las med pa mi 'byung rgyu 'bras med/_/dngos por zhen cing rgyu dang 'bras bur
[\[3a.5\]]rtog pa'i sems nyid ni/_/rgyu dang rkyen du snang ste de gnyis med phyir skye dang 'jig pa med/_/skye 'jig med phyir bdag gzhan med de 'chi 'pho med phyir rtag chad med/_/des na 'khrul 'khor med cing mya ngan 'das pa med pa nyid du mngon/_/gnas kyi skad cig nam yang mi 'bras de tshe mnyam
[\[3a.6\]]'gyur de med med/_/yang dag ma yin rtog pas bskyed phyir bag chags yod pa ma yin dang /_/spyod yul med phyir kun gzhi med cing rnam rig de yang med pa bzhin/_/phyogs rnams med cing dmigs dang gnas med rnam par rig pa ji ltar skye/_/de phyir sems 'di yod med mtha'
[\[3a.7\]]las 'das shing gcig dang du mar bral/_/bde gshegs byang chub med phyir de yi rdzu 'phrul sgyu 'dra 'khrul la snang /_/de bzhin dag pa'i ye shes de dag shin tu dge ba'i rgyun nyid dang /_/chos kyi dbyings nyid la ni de dag dmigs shing skye bar brtags pa yang /_/rdo rje'i gnas med phyir na
[\[3b\]]
[\[3b.1\]]mnyam gnas rang bzhin 'drar 'gyur dang /_/chos dbyings rdo rje rtse mo de dag phyogs nyid med pas skad cig min/_/dag pa'i dge rtsa gzugs brnyan med pas 'jig rten ye shes yod mi 'gyur/_/de phyir byang chub ma chub mtshan nyid med par gcig pas blang dor med/_/don de'i tshul gyis don
[\[3b.2\]]dam rnam grangs skye 'gag med dang mnyam nyid dang /_/gnyis med bsam 'das chos dbyings brjod dang tha snyad bral la sogs/_/bstan pa de kun tha snyad yin te don dam med cing kun sgrib med/_/don dam tshul gyi lam 'dra zhes pa de nyid kun sgrib yin/_/the tshom yod med chos ni gang la'ang
[\[3b.3\]]spong zhing gnas par mi byed do/_/sgom pa dang ni chos dbyings med phyir som nyi med la dam par blta ba la yang med/_/de ltar dngos po mtha' rnams rtag dang rang bzhin sgyu ma'ang med gyur phyir/_/yod la ltos pa'i med pa'ang med de med pa'ang med/_/mtha' rnams med phyir dbus med
[\[3b.4\]]dbus la'ang gnas par mi byed la/_/gang la 'jig rten dbang phyug pad+ma kun kyang mi spong 'drar mnyam gnas/_/chos la 'khrul par mthong ba de nyid 'khrul pa yin par rab rtogs te/_/drug gis bstan pa bdud kyi las kyang mi 'dor ngan du mi rtog go/_/shes rab thabs kyi spyod la
[\[3b.5\]]mi gnas phyir na bdud kyi 'dra bar spyod/_/rang gi shes pa dam par byas pa kun las rgyal te de bsnyems nas/_/'dod chags zhe sdang skyes nas rtsod 'byung gti mug yin te don mi mthong /_/ji srid yid kyi g.yo ba de srid bdud kyi yul te phra ba'i lam/_/g.yo dang mi g.yo tha snyad mi gnas
[\[3b.6\]]gnas pa la yang gnas par mi byed do/_/snang med dbu ma'i lam de byang chub sems zhes bde gshegs gsungs/_/gzugs dang mtshan ma smon par 'dzin pa rab tu spangs nas ni/_/rnam thar gsum po bsgom pa'ang bdud kyi las te gzugs nyid stong pa'o/_/'khor ba'i lam gsum
[\[3b.7\]]spong zhing mya ngan 'das lam bsgom pa'ang bdud nyid de/_/de nyid rang bzhin ma zhi rang bzhin brtsal spangs gar mi gnas/_/'phags pa kun gyi yul dang gnas kyang 'das sogs lam nyid gzhan na med/_/ldang dang mi ldang ched du mi spong sems rten mi 'cha' mngon du min/_/'jam dpal
[\[4a\]]
[\[4a.1\]]ma yin rdul tsam g.yo ba de yin der mi gnas/_/bsgom pa'i sa mi rnyed phyir bsgoms pas rnyed phrad mi 'gyur te/_/sems kyi spyod yul shes pa de dag chos rnams kyi ni chos nyid yin/_/rnam bral gang la mchog dang tha ma med par lam mchog 'di bsgom mo/_/'du byed ma
[\[4a.2\]]skyes chos kun 'byung med bzhin du chos rnams mya ngan 'das/_/dngos med de tshe kun kyang chos kyi dbyings zhes dgra bcom rab 'byor yin/_/nam mkha' mi dmigs ming tsam dge dang mi dger 'byed med skye ba'ang med/_/rtsol ba yid la mi byed gang la'ang sems med shes dang mi shes bral/_/_
[\[4a.3\]]dran dang 'byed med gang la'ang 'ga' dang mtshungs med mi gnas mi dmigs shing /_/mnyam nas gnyis su brtag med brjod bral bya dang mi bya med de stsogs bri med/_/ched du rtsol bar yid la mi byed cis kyang mi 'khrugs mnyam shes dang /_/gang la'ang chags dang yul gyis myos skrag med
[\[4a.4\]]de mi 'bral mi gnas shing /_/mi 'phrogs mnyam shes bzhi po phyogs dang pha rol phyin rnams der shes te/_/sems kyi dbyings su goms pas lam 'di gzhan du bsgoms pas 'od gsal mi 'gyur ro/_/brda can yang dag len pa'ang byang chub chen po yin zhes ston pas rab gsungs
[\[4a.5\]]phyir/_/de la 'di ni byang chub sems nyid bskyed cing bsgom pa'i gnas yin te/_/ting 'dzin gsum po bstan par byas nas rtags kyi phyag rgya gsum bcings nas/_/chos kyi phyag rgya chen por sems nyid skyed de snying po brjod cing bsgom pa'i gnas/_/rdo rje sems dpa' bsgoms pas
[\[4a.6\]]lam kun ma nor bsgoms pa yin/_/kun du bzang po'i spyod pas ma zin dge ba'i chos ni gang yang rung /_/kun du bzang po'i spyod pa'ang bdud kyi las te zad cing mthar thug 'gyur/_/de dang ldan pa'i las ni bdud kyi las kyang byang chub spyod par gsungs/_/don 'dir mos pa de yang
[\[4a.7\]]byang chub chen po yin zhes rgyal bas rab tu bsngags/_/gnas 'dir bskyed pa tsam gyis 'jig rten gsum po bla mar bcas pa yis/_/mchod nas nyan thos bdud kyi sde rnams zil gyis gnon zhes sangs rgyas gsungs/_/thabs chen byang chub sems dpa'i gsang ba'i spyod pa 'di nyid
[\[4b\]]
[\[4b.1\]]do/_/'di med rgyal ba rnam par snang mdzad theg pa gsum ston mi srid do/_/skad cig tsam du dad pa'i shugs bskyed de yang myur du 'jam dpal gzhon nur 'gyur/_/dkyil 'khor gsang bar zhugs shing theg chen dam tshig mchog kyang gsungs pa yin/_/tshul khrims sdom pa kun kyang
[\[4b.2\]]srungs shing sbyin gnas dam par rab tu bsngags/_/de phyir byang chub sems kyi bsod nams de la gzugs yod na/_/nam mkha' bar snang de yang snod du chugs zhes rgyal bas mtshungs par gsungs/_/skye bo skye ba sna tshogs dag las skyes shing skye 'gyur skye ba'i rgyun gyi dbang song ba/_/_
[\[4b.3\]]rtog mtha' mi shes rtog pas bslus shing rtog pa'i rgyun 'brangs 'khrul pa'i rtog las phyir ldog med gyur pa/_/sgyu ma'i sgyu shes dag cing sgyu ma'i glang po 'dra bar sgyu mas rmongs pa'i sgyu ma rnams/_/rmi lam gyis bslad bzhin du rmi lam bden pa nyams shing rmi lam dbang du song ba'i rmi lam pa/_/_
[\[4b.4\]]lam 'di spong zhing mtha' dang lam gzhan lam du bltas nas ma nor lam zhes ston pa de/_/de dag rdo la gser bzhin thugs rjer rung zhing thugs rje'i thugs rjes kye ma 'bros pa yin/_/shin tu ma sbyangs dus kyis mnar ba'i skye bo lnga brgya tha ma la/_/gsung rab dri med rtogs dka' dag la
[\[4b.5\]]sgra bzhin spyod dang tshul bzhin min/_/rang gi blo gros stobs bzhin 'jug pa la sogs lta ba sna tshogs dag_/mi shes chu bos g.yengs shing gsung gi nying gu bdud rtsi rnal 'byor bral/_/de phyir rgyal bas gsungs pa'i thugs kyi gsang ba 'di/_/kun du rgyal ba rnams kyi thugs kyi spyod yul
[\[4b.6\]]thun mong ma yin yang /_/goms pa'i mthu yis mi 'gal tshul du tshad ma dag las rab bsgrubs te/_/'gro ba'i don du mi gnyis lam mchog 'di ni rab bgyis pas/_/skye ba'i skye gnas thams cad du yang skad cig tu/_/mi mthun phyogs kyis mi nyams rgyal ba kun gyi thugs 'di
[\[4b.7\]]rab rgyas shog_/'jam dpal bshes gnyen gyis mdzad pa rdzogs so//[ {D2592}]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_Ar+ya many+dzu shrI nA ma saM gI ti bi d+hi sU tra pin+t+ra ti/_bod skad du/_'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i cho ga mdo dang bsres
[\[5a\]]
[\[5a.1\]]pa/_'phags pa 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo/_/ye shes sku can gtsug gi nor bu mtshan/_/sangs rgyas gzugs kyi tshul gnas kun la khyab/_/lam mchog dam pa ston pa sman pa'i mchog_/sdug bsngal bdud 'dul 'jam mgon phyag
[\[5a.2\]]'tshal te/_/mtshan brjod bdud mdzod shin tu rtogs dka' ba/_/bdag blo mun pas dgrol bar mi nus kyang /_/dad pas phyogs bzung thigs pas nor bu gcig_/lung dang man ngag dag la brten pa bshad/_/theg pa rnams kyi gzhir 'gyur ba/_/dus gsum rnams kyi lam mchog 'di/_/_
[\[5a.3\]]dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul dang ni/_/slob dpon rnams kyi dgongs pa yis/_/theg pa sna tshogs thabs tshul gyis/_/dpag bsam shing chen 'dir phyogs tsam/_/ye shes lus can 'jam dpal gcig pur grub/_/mdo dang bsres pa'i cho ga rim pa ste/_de la dang po sgrub pa po
[\[5a.4\]]rigs dang ldan pa'i mtshan nyid bstan pa'i phyir yin/_gzhan yang dam tshig ji lta ba bzhin ston zhes mtshan nyid dang ldan pa dang /_/dbang thob par ston to/_/gzhan yang /_gsang sngags rig sngags 'chang ba'i rigs/_/zhes pa dang /_bden par smra zhing tshig mi 'gyur/_/ji skad
[\[5a.5\]]smras pa de bzhin byed/_/ces pas bsgrub pa'i snod du rung bar bstan/_yon tan las ri dang /_chu klung dang /_nags tshang tshing na 'dug kyang rung zhes pa gnas rig pa dang ldan pa'i yid dga' ba ston to/_/bzang ngan shes shing dus shes la/_/zhes pas/_bsgrub dus gza' dang rgyu skar
[\[5a.6\]]dang /_nyi ma shis pa la bya ba'i rim pa bstan to/_/dpal ldan 'byor pa phun sum tshogs/_/zhes pas bsgrub pa'i rdzas su don dam rab tu gnas par bya ba dang /_maN+Dal gsum dang /_me tog dang /_dri'i byug pa dang /_mchod bya'i khyad par mang po dang /_blo brtan dang /_yo byad dang /_
[\[5a.7\]]tshogs par bya ba'i rim pa bstan to/_/yon tan las ma rungs pa 'dul ba'i rgyal po zhes pa dang /_gshin rje gshed po bgegs kyi rgyal/_/zhes pas mtshams kyi rim pa/_hUM mtshan ma las khro bo'i rgyal po gshin rje gshed mdog nag pa zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa/_thod dbyug dang
[\[5b\]]
[\[5b.1\]]sdigs mdzub byed pa/_sbrul dang thod pas brgyan pa bskyed la/_ya mAn+ta ka hUM zhes pa dang /_mig tu ma dang Ta bkod de/_'od zer gyi rdo rje ra ba dang /_dra bar bya bar bstan to/_/snying rje chen po'i blo yi mchog_/ces pa dang /_phan 'dogs sems can mnyes gshin pa/_/zhes pas/_sems
[\[5b.2\]]can gyi don du bdag gis 'jam dpal thob par bya'o zhes sems bskyed par ston to/_/gnyis med gnyis su med par ston/_/zhes pa dang /_a ni yig 'bru kun gyi mchog_/ces pas thog ma med pa'i byang chub kyi sems thabs dang shes rab kyi brdar gyur pa'i snying gar ye shes sems
[\[5b.3\]]dpa' bsam par bya ba ston to/_/bla ma gsang sngags che ba'i mchog_/ces pa dang /_mchod 'os bstod 'os phyag gi gnas/_/rtag tu rim gror bya ba'i 'os/_/bkur 'os rjed par bya ba'i mchog_/phyag byar 'os pa bla ma'i bdag_/ces pa 'dis ston to/_/bdag gi snying gar a
[\[5b.4\]]dang hUM bsams te/_de las 'od 'phros pas bla ma dang /_dkon mchog gsum dang /_rje btsun 'jam dpal dang /_dkyil 'khor gyi lha rnams spyan drangs nas/_bdag gis bltas te/_lus kyi bkod pa yan lag gsum bskor ba byas te phyag byas la bstod do/_/bum pa bzang po
[\[5b.5\]]che ba'i mchog_/ces pa dang /_dpag bsam shing chen rgyas pa ste/_/zhes pas mchod pa'i khyad par nam mkha' ltar mnyam par bsgrubs la/_snying ga'i lha mos dbul lo zhes ston to/_/sbyin bdag chen po'i gtso bo ste/_/tshul khrims chen po 'chang ba'i mchog_/bzod chen
[\[5b.6\]]'chang ba ston pa po/_/brtson 'grus chen po brtul ba yin/_/zhes pa 'dis bstan te/_sngags dang phyag rgya dang ldan pas/_/bdag gi snying ga nas lha mo bzhi spros te/_gnas pa rnam pa gsum du mchod par bya'o/_/de bas na/_dbugs 'byin chen po dga' ston che/_/dga' chen rol
[\[5b.7\]]mo chen po ste/_/bkur sti rim gro phun sum tshogs/_/zhes pas bstan to/_/bsam gtan chen po'i ting 'dzin gnas/_/zhes bya ba nas/_smon lam ye shes rgya mtsho ste/_/zhes bya ba dang /_byang chub yan lag me tog spos/_/zhes bya bas/_phyi'i lha mo bzhi ste snying ga nas
[\[6a\]]
[\[6a.1\]]gong gi tshul du sngags dang phyag rgya dang bcas pas gnas su dbul lo/_/mchod pa chen po 'dod chags che/_/zhes pa nas/_dga' ba chen po mgu ba che/_/zhes pa'i bar gyis/_gsang ba bzhi mchog tu gsang ba bzhis bstan to/_/oM rdo rje sems dpa' bsdus
[\[6a.2\]]pa na/_/rdo rje rin chen bla na med/_/rdo rje chos kyi glu blangs pas/_/rdo rje las kun byed pa'o/_/zhes bya ba 'di'i rkang pa dang /_gsang ba'i mchod pa'i dus su/_sgeg mo la sogs pa dang /_rim bzhin du rkang pa bzhi dang glu blang bar bya'o/_/gzhan yang mchog tu gsang ba'i mchod pa
[\[6a.3\]]dang /_chags pa la sogs pas dbul lo/_/rgyas pas ma phye'o zhes bstan to/_/de nas 'dud nyi shus bstod de/_yang na ni thams cad kyang bstod par shes par bya'o/_/de nas sdom pa bzung ba'i mthar yang de nyid kyis shes par bya'o/_/byams pa dang snying rje ni shin tu gsal bar ston pas/_
[\[6a.4\]]tshad med pa bzhi bsgom zhes so/_/rnam par mi rtog dbyings mi zad/_/yang dag bdag med de bzhin nyid/_/yang dag mtha' ste yi ge med/_/chos dbyings dam pa zad min bdag_/ces pas de'i don bsgom pa ni/_/rang bzhin dag pa'i sngags brjod do/_/phyi dang nang gi dngos po stong
[\[6a.5\]]par bsgom zhes ston to/_/stong nyid dam pa 'dod chags blo/_/srid pa'i 'dod chags spangs pa ste/_/zhes pas pad+ma'i steng na dngos gzhi las langs te/_dang po dam tshig sems dpa' bsgom pa dang /_chos kyi 'byung gnas/_de'i tha ma 'od zer lngas bskor ba'i nang du/_pad+ma
[\[6a.6\]]zla ba'i steng du muM dmar skya'o/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i phreng bar 'gyur ba las/_sprin dkar dag pa bzhin du dkar/_/'od bzang ston ka'i zla ba'i 'od/_/nyi ma 'char ka'i dkyil ltar mdzes/_/sen mo'i 'od ni shin tu dmar/_/cod pan bzang po mthon ka'i rtse/_/skra mchog
[\[6a.7\]]mthon ka chen po can/_/zur phud lnga pa me tog thod/_/rgyan kun gyis ni rnam par brgyan/_/sdu gu 'jig rten gsum na mdzes/_/shes rab ral gri mda' gzhu thogs/_/rdo rje skyil krung rdzogs sangs rgyas/_/dpal ldan sgeg dang sgeg par ldan/_/sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan

[\[15a\]]
[\[15a.1\]]brlab par bsam/_de nas rdo rje 'chang chen po'i thugs ka nas ye shes kyi lha tshogs 'thon te nam mkha' la gnas so/_/de nas sgos bkur ba'i gtso bo byin gyis brlab pa ni/_e ma sangs rgyas thams cad ni/_/rgya chen gdod nas skye ba min/_/rdul phran ji snyed
[\[15a.2\]]thams cad kyi/_/sangs rgyas rnams ni gcig tu gyur/_/zhes brjod nas/_shar phyogs pa rnams kyi ye shes kyi lha tshogs ni mi bskyod pa'i thugs kar zhugs te/_mi bskyod pas byin gyis brlabs nas/_mi bskyod pa'i thugs ka nas slar 'thon te/_rang rang gi dam tshig gi lha byin gyis
[\[15a.3\]]brlab par bsam mo/_/de bzhin du lho phyogs dang nub phyogs dang byang phyogs kyang shes par bya'o/_/de nas dbang nod pa ni gnyis su shes par bya ste/_dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor la ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor gyis dbang bskur bar bsam pa dang /_dkyil 'khor gyi lha la sgrub pa pos dbang nod
[\[15a.4\]]pa'o/_/dam tshig la ye shes kyis dbang bskur bar bsam pa ni/_rigs lnga la rin po che'i cod pan dang dar dpyangs kyis dbang bskur bar bsam mo/_/de nas rigs kyi sems dpa' bcu drug mchod pa brgyad yum bzhi sgo ba dang sum cu rtsa gnyis la sangs rgyas lnga'i cod pan dang dar dpyangs kyis
[\[15a.5\]]dbang bskur bar bsam/_bskal ba bzang po'i sems dpa' rnams la rin po che'i cod pan dang dar dpyangs kyis dbang bskur bar bsam mo/_/de nas sgrub po pos dbang nod pa ni/_lugs gnyis te/_ye shes pa rnams dam tshig pa rnams kyi thugs ka nas slar 'thon te/_gdan re re la snang ba
[\[15a.6\]]gnyis kyi tshul du bzhugs pa la/_sgrub pa po'i rig pa'i dbang lnga'am drug nos nas/_dzaHhUM baM hoH/_zhes brjod de slar thim par bsams pa'am/_yang na dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor dang /_ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor chu dang 'o ma ltar gcig tu 'dres nas bzhugs pa la/_sgrub pa pos dbang
[\[15a.7\]]nos par bsam mo/_/ye shes pa slar 'thon te nam mkha' la bzhugs par bsam mo/_/de yang dbang gis dbang rtags ni/_sgrub pa po de bzhin gshegs pa'i zlos pa po yin na rin po che'i cod pan dang dar dpyangs kyis dbang bskur bar bsam/_sems dpa'i zlos pa po yin na/_
[\[15b\]]
[\[15b.1\]]de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i cod pan dang dar dpyangs kyis dbang bskur bar bsam mo/_/de nas sgrub pa pos byin gyis brlabs pa ni/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i zlos pa po yin na/_yum rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug mas gnas bzhi byin gyis brlab par bsam mo/_/sems dpa'i zlos pa po
[\[15b.2\]]yin na/_sems ma rdo rje ma la sogs pa yum bzhis byin gyis brlab par bsam mo/_/de nas ye shes dgug pa dang gzhug pa dang bcing pa dang dgyes par bya ba ni/_sgo bzhi'i sngags dang phyag rgyas gzhal yas khang gi nang du spyan drang ba ste/_de yang rdo rje lcags kyu'i sngags dang phyag rgyas so
[\[15b.3\]]so'i sgo nas nang du bkug par bsam/_rdo rje zhags pa'i sngags dang phyag rgyas so so'i sgo nas bcug par bsam/_rdo rje lcags sgrog gi sngags dang phyag rgyas so so'i sgo nas bcings par bsam/_rdo rje 'bebs pa'i sngags dang phyag rgyas so so'i sgo nas mnyes par bsam mo/_/de nas phyag
[\[15b.4\]]rgyas rgyas gdab pa ni gnyis te/_rgyas pa dang /_bsdus pa'o/_/rgyas pa ni sgyu 'phrul dra ba dang rtsa ba'i rgyud kyi rjes su 'brang ba las shes par bya'o/_/bsdus pa ni/_de nas dam tshig gi phyag rgyas gdab pa/_sgrub pa po'i snying gar rdo rje rtse lnga pa bsams la/_gtso bo'i sngags rings kyi
[\[15b.5\]]mjug la/_dr-i sh+ya dzaHhUM baM hoHsa ma ya s+t+waM/_sa ma ya s+t+waM/_a haM many+dzu shrI/_zhes brjod pas/_dkyil 'khor gyi lha thams cad dam tshig gi phyag rgyas gdab par bsam mo/_/chos kyi phyag rgyas gdab pa ni/_dkyil 'khor gyi lha rnams kyi ljags kyi steng du hUM dkar po las yongs su
[\[15b.6\]]gyur pa'i rdo rje dkar po rtse lnga pa re chu rgyugs su yod par bsam/_de'i lte ba la lha rnams rang rang gi sku skyed pa'i yig 'bru bkod la/_chos kyi phyag rgyas rgyas gdab par bsam mo/_/las kyi phyag rgyas rgyas gdab pa ni/_sgrub pa po'i snying gar sna tshogs rdo rje bsams la/_rdo rje khu tshur
[\[15b.7\]]gnyis bcings te/_rdo rje'i gar dgu sngon du 'gro ba'i tshul gyis/_phyag mtshan med par lha rnams kyi phyag rgya chen po'i khyer thabs bsgom pa ni/_las kyi phyag rgyas rgyas gdab po/_/phyag mtshan med par lha rnams kyi phyag rgya chen po'i khyer thabs kyi phyag rgya bcing ba ni/_de nas las
[\[16a\]]
[\[16a.1\]]kyi phyag rgya bcing ba 'byung ste/_rdo rje khu tshur dam bcings te/_/mnyam par gzhag pas gnyis su bya/_/rdo rje'i phyag rgyas gnyis bcings te/_/de nas bcing ba rab tu bshad/_/g.yon pa'i rdo rje mdzub mo ni/_/g.yas pa'i nang du bsgreng bar bya/_/byang chub
[\[16a.2\]]mchog gi phyag rgya che/_/sangs rgyas byang chub sbyin byed pa'o/_/mi g.yo ba yis reg pa'o/_/rin chen gyi ni mchog sbyin pa'o/_/tshe dpag med kyi ting 'dzin mchog_/gdon mi za ba'i mi 'jigs sbyin/_/de nas las kyi phyag rgya rnams/_/mdor bsdus rab tu bshad par bya/_/rdo rje
[\[16a.3\]]sems sogs sems dpa' rnams/_/rdo rje las rnams byed pa ste/_/bsgyings bcas gsor ba gnyis ka yin/_/lcags kyu 'dzin ltar gnas pa dang /_/mda' 'phangs pa yi tshul dang ni/_/legs so zhes pa snying gar gzhag_/dbang bskur ba ni rdo rje gnyis/_/snying gar nyi ma
[\[16a.4\]]bstan par bya/_/g.yon pa la ni gru mo gzugs/_/de bzhin kha phyogs bskor bar bya/_/g.yas pa yis ni g.yon par dbye/_/snying gar g.yon pa ral gri mdud/_/mgal me'i 'khor lo bskor ba dang /_/rdo rje gnyis ka kha nas dbyung /_/rdo rje gar ni bskor ba yi/_/thal mo 'gram
[\[16a.5\]]pa spyi bor gzhag_/go cha mthe chung mche ba dang /_/khu tshur gnyis ni mnan pa'o/_/rdo rje bsgyings pa'i tshul gyis su/_/bsam pa g.yos pas 'dud par bya/_/phreng ba bcings dang kha nas dbyung /_/rdo rje gar ni bskor ba yin/_/rdo rje khu tshur tshul gyis ni/_/bdug pa la sogs de bzhin
[\[16a.6\]]sbyin/_/sangs rgyas kun la mchod pa yi/_/phyag rgya'i mchod pa byed pa po/_/mdzub mos lcags kyu bcings pa ni/_/mthe chung las de lcags kyu che/_/mkhrig ma mdud pa mdzub gnyis mdud/_/rgyab gnyis kyang ni bsnyams te mnan/_/sgo gnyis pa dang /_gsum pa la sogs pa
[\[16a.7\]]lnga'i las kyi phyag rgya bcings pa ni/_so so'i gtso bo bzhin du thabs re sgo re'am/_phyogs bzhir bcings pa'o/_/de rnams ni 'dir mang du spro mi dgos pa'i phyir mang du ma spros pa'o//_//de nas phyag rgya chen pos rgyas gdab pa ni/_sgrub pa po'i snying gar rdo rje rtse lnga pa bsams la/_
[\[16b\]]
[\[16b.1\]]rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings nas/_/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi spyi'i snying po/_/oM hUM hrIHzhes yid la zlos shing /_rdo rje khu tshur gnyis rdo rje gar ma byas par/_rang rang gi phyag mtshan phyag na bsnams par bsgom pa ni/_phyag rgya chen pos rgyas btab par bsgom pa'o/_/_
[\[16b.2\]]de las lha las la sbyar ba ni/_gzhung las/_de nas las kyi rgyal mchog ni/_/sgra las 'phel te rgyas bshad pas/_/'dir ni bdag gis ma bshad do/_/zhes 'byung bas/_sgra las 'phel te bshad na/_gsang ldan nam sgo dang po'i lha las la gzhag pa ni/_lha'i dag pa dang
[\[16b.3\]]mthun par las la gzhag ste/_sngags don rnam par gzigs pa'i lha'i dag pa dang mthun no/_/sgo gnyis pa'i gti mug sel ba ni rnam par snang mdzad do/_/bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis/_sems can thams cad kyi gti mug sbyongs shig pa'o/_/de bzhin du zhe sdang
[\[16b.4\]]dang /_'dod chags dang /_ser sna dang /_phrag dog sbyongs shig pa'o/_/yang na sngon gyi lha thams cad kyi spro bsdu dran par byas pa ni las la sbyar ba'o/_/las kyi khyad par gyi ting nge 'dzin to zhes pa ni/_mtshams sbyar bar bya'o/_/de nas spos kyi chu dag la/_/sngags bzlas pa yis
[\[16b.5\]]bsang byas te/_/phung pos bsdu ba'i mchod pa lngas/_/rim bzhin byin brlabs mdun bzhag nas/_/'di dag rim pa'i rim gyis/_/se gol rim pas brdab byas pas/_/rim bzhin bsdu ba'i phyag rgya ni/_/dzaHhUM baM hoHldan byas te/_/mdun na mngon sum bzhin mthong nas/_/_
[\[16b.6\]]sa mA dzaHzhes brjod cing /_'khor lo tshogs mchog de dag la/_/mnyam med la sogs bstod par bya/_/de nas gtso bo sngags rings la/_/dr-i sh+ya zhes kyang brjod bya zhing /_/a haM zhes dang ldan par ni/_/bzhi yis rgyas gdab don mchog sgrub/_/de nas mchod pa'i bye brag gis/_/mchod
[\[16b.7\]]nas phyag bzhi bya ba ni/_/dang po'i sangs rgyas la sogs pa'i/_/gnas su bya ba'i rim pa'o/_/de dag ni yongs su rdzogs pa'i chos kyi ting nge 'dzin to zhes bya bas yongs su rdzogs pa'i ting nge 'dzin bstan pa ste/_de dag ni yang spyi don dgu'i sgo nas shes par bya ste/_de nas spos kyi chu
[\[17a\]]
[\[17a.1\]32 ]dag la/_/sngags bzlas pa yis bsang bya ste/_/phung pos bsdus pa'i mchod pa lnga/_/rim bzhin byin brlabs mdun bzhag nas/_/zhes bya bas/_mchod pa byin gyis brlabs pa ston te/_spyir sbyang zhing sreg pa dang /_sgo sgo'i sngags dang phyag rgyas byin gyis brlabs te/_sngon bzhin no/_/
[\[17a.2\]]'di dag rim pa'i go rims kyis/_/se gol rim par brdab byas pas/_/rim bzhin bsdu ba'i phyag rgya ni/_/dzaHhUM baM hoHldan byas te/_/mdun na mngon sum bzhin mthong nas/_/zhes bya bas/_rang bzhin gyi sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' bsdu ba ston to/_/de yang rdo rje bsdu ba'i sngags
[\[17a.3\]]dang phyag rgyas rang bzhin gyi sangs rgyas spyan drangs la mdun gyi nam mkha' la byon par bsam mo/_/sa mA dzaHzhes brjod bya zhing /_/'khor lo tshogs mchog de dag la/_/mnyam med la sogs bstod par bya/_/zhes pas bstod pa ston te/_sngags sngon du 'gro bas de nas bstod pa ni/_
[\[17a.4\]]mnyam med mi g.yo'am/_'dud nyi shus bstod pa bya'o/_/de nas dgug pa dang bcing ba dang mnyes par bya ba ni/_sgo bzhi'i sngags dang phyag rgyas gzhal yas khang gi nang du spyan drangs pa la sogs pa ste sngon bzhin no/_/de nas gtso bo'i sngags rings la/_/dr-i sh+ya zhes kyang brjod bya
[\[17a.5\]]zhing /_/A haM zhes dang ldan par ni/_/bzhi yis rgyas gdab don mchog bsgrub/_/ces bya bas/_lha thams cad ni phyag rgya bzhis rgyas gdab pa ste/_de yang phyag rgyas gdab pa ni/_las mchog gi skabs bzhin shes par bya'o/_/de nas mchod pa'i bye brag gis/_/mchod nas zhes
[\[17a.6\]]bya bas mchod pa dbul ba ston te/_de yang mchod pa dbul ba ni/_/thun mong gi mchod pa rnam pa lnga dang /_phyi nang gi lha mo brgyad kyi mchod pa dang /_bsgrub chos bcu drug dang /_mchod pa gzhan yang ci 'byor tshad du dbul lo/_/phyag bzhi bya ba ni/_dang po sangs rgyas la sogs
[\[17a.7\]]pa'i/_/gnas su bya ba'i rim pa'o/_/zhes bya bas phyag btsal bar ston te/_de yang phyag bzhi btsal ba ni/_/shar phyogs kyi sgo nas rdo rje rigs kyi phyag btsal ba dang /_lho phyogs kyi sgo nas rin po che'i rigs kyi phyag btsal ba dang /_nub phyogs kyi sgo nas pad+ma'i rigs kyi phyag btsal
[\[17b\]]
[\[17b.1\]33 ]ba dang /_byang phyogs kyi sgo nas las kyi rigs kyi phyag btsal ba ste/_lus kyi bca' thabs dang ting nge 'dzin gyi rim pa dang phyag rgya dang sngags dang phyogs dang lngas shes par bya ste/_sngon bzhin no/_/de'i 'og tu bla ma'i gdams ngag gis mnyam pa gsum dang bsnyen pa ni bsgom pa dang /_
[\[17b.2\]]mtshan brjod pa'i gsung rab gdon pa dang sngags bzlas pa rnams ston pa ni/_de yang mnyam pa rnam pa gsum gyis mnyam par bsres la/_bsgom bzlas bya ba ni/_oM badzra At+ma ko\u0f85haM/_zhes brjod pas dkyil 'khor gyi lha thams cad dang bdag sku gsung thugs rdo rje mnyam pas mnyam pa nyid
[\[17b.3\]]du bsam/_oM swa b+hA wa bi shud+d+ho\u0f85haM/_zhes brjod pas/_lha thams cad dang bdag rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag par mnyam pas mnyam pa nyid du bsgom/_oM sarba sa mo\u0f85haM zhes brjod pas/_lha thams cad dang bdag med par mnyam pas mnyam pa nyid du bsgom mo/_/de ltar mnyam pa
[\[17b.4\]]nyid gsum gyis mnyam par bsres la/_lha thams cad kyi rang bzhin bdag yin no bar bsams la bsgom pa dang /_mtshan dang sngags kyi bzlas pa byed na yang /_lha thams cad kyi rang bzhin bdag yin no bar bsams la/_bdag gis mtshan dang sngags kyi bzlas pa byas pa'i dus su lha
[\[17b.5\]]thams cad kyi zhal nas kyang bzlas pa'i sgra 'byung bar bsam/_de ltar byas nas bsnyen pa lngar 'gyur te/_bsgom pa'i bsnyen pa la dus kyi bsnyen pa dang /_mtshan ma'i bsnyen pa gnyis so/_/bzlas pa'i bsnyen pa la/_dus kyi bsnyen pa dang /_mtshan ma'i bsnyen pa dang /_grangs kyi bsnyen pa
[\[17b.6\]]dang gsum mo/_/de ltar bsnyen pa rnam pa lnga'o/_/de la sngags rnams 'di yin te/_oM sarba ta thA ga ta ma hA yo gI shwa ra hUM/_oM badzra satwa hUM/_oM badzra rat+na hUM/_oM badzra d+harma hUM/_oM badzra karma hUM/_oM badzra badzri Ni hUM/_oM d+harma badzri Ni hUM/_oM karma badzri Ni hUM/_oM badzra lA s+ya hUM/_

[\[18a.1\]34 ]oM badzra hA sa ha/_oM badzra d+harma hrIH/_oM badzra tIk+Sh+Na d+hIH/_oM badzra he tu maM/_oM badzra b+hA Sha raM/_oM badzra karma kaM_/_oM badzra rak+Sha haM/_oM badzra yak+Sha hUM/_oM badzra san+d+hi baM/_oM badzra aM ku sha dzaH/_oM badzra bA sha hUM/_oM badzra s+pho Ta baM/_oM badzra A be sha a/_khyad par gyi
[\[18a.2\]]snying po'i sngags so/_/oM badzra pradz+nyA dz+nyA na mUrta ye ya te na maH/_oM duHkhats+tshe da ya te na maH/_oM badzra tIk+Sh+Na ya te na maH/_oM wA gI shwa ra ya te na maH/_oM dz+nyA na kA ya ya te na maH/_oM a ra pa tsa na ya te na maH/_thun mong gi sngags te/_go bzlog par shes par bya'o/_/oM sarba d+harmA a b+hA ba swa b+hA
[\[18a.3\]]ba/_bi shud+d+ha/_badzra a A aM a/_bra kr-i ta pa ri shud+d+ha/_sarba d+harmA/_ya du ta/_sarba ta thA ga ta dz+nyA na kA ya/_many+dzu shrI pa ri shud+d+hi ta mu pa da ya ti/_a A/_sarba ta thA ga ta hr-i da ya/_ha ra ha ra/_oM hUM hrIH/_b+ha ga bAn/_dz+nyA na mUrti wA gI shwa ra/_ma hA ba tsa/_sarba d+harmA ga ga na/_a ma la su ba ri
[\[18a.4\]]shud+d+ha d+harma d+hA tu dz+nyA na gar+b+ha aH/_zhes bya ba ni/_lha thams cad kyi spyi'i sku'i sngags dang rtsa ba'i sngags dang phreng sngags so/_/bsnyen pa bstan pa'o//_//de nas sgrub pa la 'jug pa ni/_de nas rang dga'i gnas nyid du/_/gzugs brnyan dkyil 'khor bri bar bya/_/zhes bya bas/_bsgrub

[\[18b\]]
[\[18b.1\]]gyi sa bcad la sa'i lto 'phye brtag par byas la/_lto ba nas sa brkos te sa'i ro lnga spangs pa dang ldan par bya'o/_/sa'i ro lnga ni/_sa'i ro gseg ma dang /_mi'i ro rus pa dang skra shad kyi dum bu dang /_rdza'i ro gyo dum dang /_shing gi ro mgal dum la sogs pa dang /_rtswa'i ro phub ma la sogs pa

[\[18b.3\]]bslang ba'o/_/sa'i lha mo la bslang ba dang /_dkon mchog gsum la bslang ba dang /_sa bdag la sogs pa la bslang ba'o/_/de nas yid kyis sa'i lha mo gser gyi mdog can/_lag na gser gyi bum pa thogs pa cig_/sa'i 'og nas sku phyed tsam 'thon par bsams la/_spos chus

[\[19a\]]
[\[19a.1\]]byin gyis brlabs la/_dpung pa bzang po'i rgyud las byung ba'i tshigs su bcad pas gtor ma byin la/_pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te spos thogs te/_phyogs bcur bzhugs pa'i lha klu dang /_/gnod sbyin dri za lha ma yin/_/yang dag rdzu 'phrul cher
[\[19a.2\]]ldan pa'i/_/'byung la gnas pa'i 'byung po kun/_/bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba yis/_/sangs rgyas rnams la mchod pa dang /_/sems can rnams la phan don du/_/dam pa'i dkyil 'khor cher 'byung ba/_/ji ltar bsams pa bzhin 'bri na/_/khyed kyis bar chad ma byed par/_/dge
[\[19a.3\]]ba'i grogs po nyid du mdzod/_/da ltar bdag gis khyod la ni/_/bzod par gsol gyis mi slu bar/_/rmi lam la sogs mtshan ma yi/_/legs nyes ltas rnams bstan du gsol/_/lan gsum gsol ba btab pas/_sa bdag la sogs pas dkyil 'khor gyis shig pa'i

[\[32b.1\]]dang /_lo tsa ba klog skyas bsgyur ba'o/_/gsang ldan gyi tho yig bzhugs/[ {D2594}]@##/_/'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo/_/rigs kun bdag po 'jam dpal dang /_/bla ma de la phyag 'tshal lo/_/mchog dang thun mong sgrub 'dod pa/_/gang
[\[32b.2\]]zag rnams la phan pa'i phyir/_/bla ma rim pa brgyud pa yi/_/cho ga'i rim pa brjod par bya/_/dkyil 'khor bdun gyi cho ga la/_/bsnyen pa sa dang sta gon dang /_/dkyil 'khor zhag gi cho ga'o/_/bsnyen pa'i las su bya ba la/_/dang po las dang sbyor ba gsum/_/mchod bstod
[\[32b.3\]]bsnyen pa bya ba'o/_/dang po'i las su bya ba la/_/nye reg 'thor 'thung stong par bsgom/_/skur gyur lce dang lag pa brlab/_/bsrung dang tshogs bsags phyag lnga bya/_/sdom bzung lus bsregs skur ldang ngo /_/srung la bdag dang gnas bsrung ste/_/bdag nyid bsrung ba bya ba yang /_/_
[\[32b.4\]]bskyed brlab dbang dang go bgo'o/_/gnas bsrung ba yi rim pa la/_/bsnun dang bsreg dang bcing ba bya/_/khro bo rdo rje'i ra ba sgom/_/tshogs bsags pa yi rim pa yang /_/sbyin sreg bya zhing mchod pa brlab/_/rten sprul bstod de gsal por sgom/_/dga' bar gyur pas bstod pa
[\[32b.5\]]bya/_/phyag mchod sdig bshags yi rang bya/_/bskul dang gsol gdab dge ba bsngo/_/skyabs 'gro lam bstan sems bskyed do/_/bstod bya gnang sbyin slar bstod bya/_/sbyor ba gsum la dang po dang /_/rgyal mchog dang ni las dag go/_/dang po'i sbyor ba bya ba la/_/ye
[\[32b.6\]]shes bzhi dang gtso bo bskyed/_/ye shes me long mnyam nyid dang /_/so sor chos dbyings nan tan no/_/gzhi la rdo rje mchod rten dang /_/chos 'byung rgya gram bsgom pa dang /_/gzhal yas gdan dang bcas pa'o/_/gtso bo bskyed pa dag la yang /_/cho ga rnam pa gsum
[\[32b.7\]]las su/_/gzhi yi sangs rgyas bskyed pa dang /_/dang po'i sangs rgyas 'khor lo dang /_/ye shes sems dang zla ba a'o/_/dkyil 'khor rgyal mchog bsgom pa yang /_/dang por yig 'bru bskyed pa dang /_/de las phyag mtshan sku phra mo/_/thig ler gyur te sku rnams bskyed/_/_
[\[33a\]]
[\[33a.1\]]las kyi rgyal po mchog la ni/_/sgo dbye bsdu bskrad yon dbul bstod/_/bstims la bskrad de sgo yang bcad/_/rgyas gdab dbang bskur las la sbyar/_/mchod cing bstod pa bya ba yang /_/dang po'i sangs rgyas bye byas la/_/mchod brlab sgo dbye snyan gsan
[\[33a.2\]]dbab/_/spyan drang bskrad la yon dbul bstod/_/nang du dgug gzhug bya ba dang /_/bskrad cing sgo bcad go yang bgo/_/rgyas gdab dbang dang ldan par bya/_/mchod dang bstod pa rgyas par bya'o/_/bsnyen pa bya ba'i rim pa yang /_/phyag byas thugs zhugs la sngags brjod/_/_
[\[33a.3\]]sngags dgod brtan byas bzlas pa bya/_/thun mtshams dag tu rang bya la/_/mchod bstod phyag rgya dge ba bsngo/_/bzod gsol lha bsdus spyod lam bya/_/thun la bab na nang zhugs bskrad/_/sgo bcad lha dgod mchod pa brlab/_/mchod bstod phyag bya yon chab dbul/_/thugs kar
[\[33a.4\]]zhugs te gong ltar bya/_thun gsum dag la de dang 'bar/_/thun bzhi pa yi tha ma ru/_/gong ltar byas la don gsol gdab/_/smon lam btab la ye shes gshegs/_/dkyil 'khor bsdus te rang la bsrung /_/brgya pa bzlas te spyod lam bya'o/_/de ni bsnyen pa rgyas pa'o/_/bsnyen
[\[33a.5\]]pa bsdus pa bya ba yang /_/gtso bo yan chad bsgom byas la/_/sbyor ba rnam gnyis gzhag pa ste/_/phyi ma gong ltar bya ba yin/_/grangs dang mtshan ma'i bsnyen pa yang /_/bzlas dang bsgom pa'i khyad par ro/_/de ltar byas pa'i rjes dag la/_/phran tshegs pa ni ci rigs gdags/_/_
[\[33a.6\]]de rnams sngon du bsnyen pa'o/_/de nas sa yi cho ga ste/_/brtag dang bslang dang sbyang ba dang /_/gzung dang rdo rje'i sgrub pa'o/_/brtag pa phyogs dang mtshan nyid dang /_/gnas dang lto 'phye brtag pa'o/_/bslang ba snang dang mi snang ste/_/mi snang ba la bslang ba yang /_/maN+Dal
[\[33a.7\]]byas la dri tshom dgod/_/bdag nyid lhar bskyed lha tshogs sprul/_/de la mchod bstod gtor ma sbyin/_/lha mo bskyed la spyan drangs te/_/bskrad bstim rgyas gdab dbang bskur bya/_/mchod dang gtor dbul sa bslang bya/_/ye shes gshegs la dam tshig bstim/_/sbyang ba

[\[33b.1\]]las dang bya ba dang /_/sngags dang phyag rgyas sbyang byas te/_/pra brtag bum gzhug 'thas par bcag_/rdo rje bsgrub par bya ba ni/_/slob dpon rgyan gyis brgyan byas la/_/stegs bu'i dbus su gnas byas te/_/dang por nye reg bya ba nas/_/bzlas la thug pa yan chod bya/_/_

[\[33b.3\]]la/_/phur bus gdab pa'i las bya'o/_/sta gon bya ba'i rim pa ni/_/lha dang bum pa sbyin sreg dang /_/lha mo dang ni slob ma'o/_/lha yi sta gon bya ba la/_/gnas su dri dang me tog dgod/_/de las lhar bskyed bstims la mchod/_/bum pa mtshan nyid ldan byas la/_/mtshon
[\[33b.4\]]bya mgul chings kha rgyan te/_/bskrad bdug bsangs la bcud blug go/_/bum pa baM las bskyed byas la/_/nang du lha bskyed spyan yang drang /_bstims la rgyas gdab dbang ldan bya/_/mchod cing bstod la bzlas pa bya'o/_/sbyin sreg shar du thab byas la/_/shing btser
[\[33b.5\]]me spar me lha bskyed/_/de la mchod la thugs kar ni/_/sum brtsegs bskyed la spyan drangs bstim/_/mchod cing bstod la bsreg rdzas dbul/_/spyan ma gnod sbyin dag la yang /_/sbyin sreg rim bzhin dbul bar bya/_/sa yi lha mo'i sta gon ni/_/gong ltar

[\[33b.7\]]lhar bskyed byin brlabs de la mchod/_/so shing ku sha srung skud gdags/_/gzengs bstod nyal gzhug spro ba bskyed/_/lha la mchod cing bstod pa bya/_/phyag byas gsol ba lan gsum gdab/_/dge ba bsngo zhing bzod gsol bya/_/gsol cing bkra shis smon
[\[34a\]]
[\[34a.1\]]lam gdab/_/sangs rgyas dang por mtshan 'don gnas/_/dkyil 'khor zhag gi cho ga la/_/thig dang tshon dang bsgrub pa dang /_/'jug cing dbang bskur bya ba'o/_/thig la las dang ye shes te/_/ye shes snal ma sar pa la/_/byin brlabs bsgril te snod
[\[34a.2\]]bcug mchod/_/bzlas te rim pas gdab par bya/_/gdab pa dang po gnam thig ste/_/de nas sa thig gdab pa'o/_/tshon ni byin brlabs bzlas te dgye/_/pan tsa ra ka phyogs tshon dang /_/mtshan ma'i bye brag bri bar bya/_/bsgrub pa bya ba'i rim pa yang /_/dkyil 'khor brgyan
[\[34a.3\]]te mdo gdon gzhag_/khrus byas brgyan la shar sgor gnas/_/bsrung dang bsang gtor dkyil 'khor bslang /_/sgo dbye bum dgod lhar bskyed de/_/nam mkha'i lha tshogs phab la bsre/_/bdag nyid dang po'i lhar bskyed de/_/sngags bzlas phar spro tshur bsdu bya/_/lha rnams
[\[34a.4\]]stong bsgoms slar la bskyed/_/de nas sgo dbye la sogs pa/_/sngon du bstan pa bzhin du bya/_/phyi rol dag tu byung byas la/_/'jig rten pa la gtor ma sbyin/_/slar la nang du zhugs byas la/_/sbyin sreg dag gis tshim par byas/_/de nas slob ma 'jug pa yang /_/lha la

[\[34a.6\]]ba bdag_/slob dpon 'dod phyir yang gsol gdab/_/de nas dam tshig dag ni dpog_/dam tshig 'dzin par khas len gzhug_/sems bskyed pa dang lhar bskyed brlab/_/dam tshig bsgrag cing de la mchod/_/las kyi bum pas dbang yang bskur/_/sgo bzhir bcug
[\[34a.7\]]la slar yang ni/_/shar sgor bzhag la mna' yang bsgags/_/mna' chu blud la ye shes dbab/_/mchod cing smrar gzhug phreng ba dor/_/mgo la bcings te snang ba brtag_/mig dbye ba dang dkyil 'khor bstan/_/dbang bskur ba yi rim pa yang /_/sgrub pa po dang slob

[\[34b.1\]]dpon ni/_/sgrub pa po ru dbang bskur na/_/rang gi lhar bskyed de la mchod/_/dang po rig pa'i dbang bskur te/_/bkra shis brjod cing chu dbang bskur/_/dbu rgyan dang ni rdo rje sbyin/_/dril bu dang ni ming yang gdags/_/gsang ba'i ye shes sngags kyang sbyin/_/phyag rgya
[\[34b.2\]]bzhi brlab brtul zhugs sbyin/_/slob dpon dag tu dbang bskur na/_/shar sgor sna tshogs pad+ma bri/_/slob ma sangs rgyas dang por bskyed/_/rig pa'i dbang lnga bskur bar bya/_/dam tshig gsum dang gsang ba dang /_/gsang rgyal dang ni nges pa'i dbang /_/rim pa
[\[34b.3\]]bzhin du bskur bar bya'o/_/dam tshig gsum la rdo rje dang /_/dril bu dang ni phyag rgya'o/_/gsang ba'i dbang la dkyil 'khor dang /_lha dang slob dpon las rnams so/_/gsang rgyal dag gi dbang bskur ba/_/de bzhin rigs dang rdo rje dang /_/rin po che dang pad+ma dang /_/las
[\[34b.4\]]kyi rigs kyi gsang ba'o/_/nges pa'i dbang la gzhan don dang /_/rang don nges pa'i dbang bskur ro/_/gzhan don nges pa'i dbang bskur na/_/bye brag dag dang spyi dag go/_/bye brag la yang 'di lta ste/_/de bzhin rigs dang rdo rje dang /_/rin chen rigs dang pad+ma dang /_/las
[\[34b.5\]]kyi rigs kyi nges pa'o/_/rang don nges pa'i dbang bskur ba/_/gsang ba'i ye shes brlab cing sngags kyang sbyin/_/phyag rgya bzhi brlab lung yang bstan/_/gzengs bstod pa dang dbugs dbyung ba'o/_/de mthar dbang bstan bya ba'i phyir/_/brtul zhugs dag gi dbang
[\[34b.6\]]bskur ro/_/de ltar dbang bskur rdzogs pa dang /_/dkyil 'khor lha la mchod cing bstod/_/dge ba bsngo zhing bzod gsol bya/_/smon lam btab la don gsol gdab/_/ye shes gshegs la dkyil 'khor bsdu/_/brgya pa bzlas shing gzugs brnyan bkru/_/lhag

[\[35a\]]
[\[35a.1\]]pa smr-i ti dz+nyA na kIrti sa mdzad pa rdzogs so/_/[{D2595}]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_Ar+ya many+dzu shrI nA ma sing+gI ti maN+Dal bi d+hi/_bod skad du/_'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga/_/rje btsun 'jam pa'i dbyangs
[\[35a.2\]]la phyag 'tshal lo/_/ngo bo nyid kyi sku mnga' zhing /_/sgyu ma'i rang bzhin 'byung gnas che/_/sangs rgyas rnams kyi sprul pa'i sku/_/'jam pa'i dbyangs la phyag 'tshal te/_/dkyil 'khor cho ga bshad par bya/_/dang por re zhig slob ma ni/_/dad ldan dam tshig brtul
[\[35a.3\]]zhugs bsrung /_/rtog med rgyud gcig bla ma dang /_/'jam pa'i dpal la mos pa yis/_/khro med sngags dang rgyud la mkhas/_/thos ldan rgyud 'dir dbang thob pas/_/dam tshig gsum la gnas pa des/_/dang po 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi lha rnams sgrub pa'i thabs

[\[35b\]]
[\[35b.1\]]sa slong ba'o/_/de nas drag po'i sbyin sreg gis bgegs bzlog pa/_/de nyid du bdag dang blo zhi ba'i phyir sbyin sreg byas la der sa sbyang bar bya ste/_'dom gang tsam la sogs pa brkos la sa'i ro lnga bsal te/_de rin po che lnga dang ldan pa'i bum pa bcug la slar sas dgang
[\[35b.2\]]ngo /_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i ras ris la sogs pa ji tsam 'byor pa yang bris la dkyil 'khor nyis 'gyur la spos kyis chag chag btab ste/_lag pa sa la reg par bya'o/_/rje btsun gyi yi ge brgya pa lan bdun bzlas par bya'o/_/sa bzung ba'i rim pa'o/_/de nas
[\[35b.3\]]bdag nyid ji snyed pa'i rgyan dang ldan par byas te/_bkra shis pa'i dus su dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su 'dug la/_sgrub pa'i thabs las 'byung ba bzhin du/_/bdag bsrung ba nas bgegs gzhom pa la sogs pa bya ba dang /_de nas rten sprul pa nas tshogs bsags pa nas/_
[\[35b.4\]]ye shes par gyur pa'i bar du byas la/_der gong gi dang 'dra ba'i lha mo sta gon byas la/_de nas spro ba bskyed de/_deng du bdag tshe 'bras bu yod/_/bdag ni gson pa 'bras bur bcas/_/lha dang dam tshig mnyam pa ru/_/gyur par bdag ni som nyi med/_/byang
[\[35b.5\]]chub sems dang sems gcig las/_/mi ldog par ni bdag gyur te/_/'jam pa'i dbyangs kyi rigs su ni/_/deng bdag skye bar the tshom med/_/deng bdag nyi ma dam pa ste/_/mchod sbyin 'di ni bla na med/_/phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas spyan 'dren pa/_/deng bdag
[\[35b.6\]]'dus pa'i mchog yin no/_/de nas phyag byas spos thogs la/_/kye dbang ni nges te bla na med/_/phyogs bcur bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas kun/_/ma lus bdag la dgongs su gsol/_/bdag ming 'di zhes bya ba yis/_/'jam pa'i dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor bri/_/deng
[\[35b.7\]]'dir sangs rgyas kun gshegs te/_/dngos grub 'di ni stsal du gsol/_/zhes brjod la dang po'i sbyor ba dang /_dkyil 'khor rgyal mchog dang las kyi rgyal po mchog rnam par bsgoms la/_yang sgo dbye ba la sogs pa sngon du 'gro ba nas bdag nyid ye shes pa'i gnas su
[\[36a\]]
[\[36a.1\]]'dug pa'i bar du bya ste/_phreng ba'i sngags zlos pa la sogs pa'i rnal 'byor pa'i sgrub pa'i grogs lha'i nga rgyal dang ldan pas dkyil 'khor bri ba'i phyir 'dud kyis bstod de/_de nas/_rgyud chen sgyu 'phrul dra ba las/_/rdo rje 'chang chen gsang sngags 'chang /_/dpag

[\[36a.3\]]bdag nyid/_/de nas mig dang rkang pa byin gyis brlabs te/_bsgoms pa'i dkyil 'khor steng du bteg la/_byang shar mtshams nas bskor ba byas te/_hUM ye shes zhi ba'i ngang las ma g.yos kyang /_/sku yi cha lugs za byed rngam stabs can/_/gsung gi nga ro 'brug stong ldir ba'i sgras/_/_
[\[36a.4\]]ma lus dbang du sdud la phyag 'tshal lo/_/gzhan yang tsham rngam gyi dbyangs brjod la/_hUM dkyil 'khor chen po'i sa gzhi la gnas pa'i/_lha la sogs pa'i bgegs tshogs kun nyon cig_/gnas 'dir 'jam dpal dkyil 'khor ngas 'dri yis/_/bgegs kyi rigs
[\[36a.5\]]tshogs gang yin 'byer bar gyis/_/ci ste nga yi bka' las 'das gyur na/_/ye shes can gyi ral gri 'bar ba yis/_/mgo bo tshal pa brgyar ni 'gas byed cing /_/rnam par 'jig par 'gyur bar gdon mi za/_/deng sa phyogs nam mkha' ltar dri ma med pa 'di/_/deng rnal 'byor
[\[36a.6\]]gyi dbang phyug chen po zhes bya bas/_sems can thams cad rdzogs pa'i byang chub la dgod pa'i phyir/_'jam dpal gyi dkyil 'khor 'dri yis/_hUM lha klu gnod sbyin dri za dang /_/'byung po sha za srin po'i tshogs/_/'byung po thams cad sar song zhig_/'jam dpal bka' thos
[\[36a.7\]]myur du song /_/gang dag mi 'gro de la ni/_/ral gri dang ni kha T+wAM gas/_/spyi bo tshal pa brgyar 'gas 'gyur/_/lan gsum du brjod do/_/bskal pa me lta bu'i 'og nas byung nas/_gdug pa can thams cad bsreg par bsam mo/_/de nas dkyil 'khor gyi lte bar 'dug ste/_
[\[36b\]]
[\[36b.1\]]bskal pa'i me lta bu'i khro bo'i 'byin pas gdug pa can thams cad bskrad par bya'o/_/de nas dag pa yongs su bskor ba'i tshul gyis shar du 'gro bar bya'o/_/de nas g.yon brkyang bas bgegs bskrad do/_/de nas gnod sbyin gyi 'gros kyis lhor song la/_/g.yas brkyang
[\[36b.2\]]bas bgegs bskrad do/_/de nas rdo rje 'gros kyis nub tu song la/_zlum pa'i stangs stabs byas la bgegs bskrad do/_/de nas byang du rdo rje 'gros kyis song ba der sa ga'i 'dug stangs kyis bgegs bskrad la/_de nas 'gying 'gros kyis shar du 'gro bar bya'o/_/yang rdo rje
[\[36b.3\]]'gros kyis dkyil 'khor gyi lte ba bskor la phur bu'i 'gros bya'o/_/dbus der hUM sgra rgyun mi bcad do/_/der phyed pas 'dug la rdo rje'i lta bas bgegs bsnun la/_bsreg pa bcing ba phyogs dang mtshams ra ba dra ba byas la/_oM badzra dz+wa la a na lArka hUM/_hUM badzra a na la ha
[\[36b.4\]]na da ha pa tsa ma tha b+hany+dza ra Na hUM/_badzra ne tri ban+d+ha sarba big+haM/_oM dr-i D+ho me b+ha ba/_rak+Sha sarba swA hA/_oM hu lu hu lu hUM phaT/_oM druM ban+d+ha hUM/_oM badzra pA sha hri/_oM badzra pA taM ke pA taM ke ni ra Ta/_hri badzra ka li ru Ta ma Ta/_oM badzra shi kha ri ru Ta ma Ta/_hUM badzra karma badzra ban+d+ha baM/_sarba maN+Dal hUM dza/_gsang ba 'dug la/_ma hA tsakra
[\[36b.5\]]maN+Da si a ti si ta hUM gis byin gyis brlabs la/_de nas seng ldeng las byas pa'i phur bu la/_tsan+dan dmar pos byugs la/_srad bu dmar po dang me tog dmar pos bcings la stod khro bo la smad rdo rje rtse gcig pa'i dbyibs su 'dug la hUM las sprin sgra la sogs pa bskyed
[\[36b.6\]]la/_oM badzra kI li kI la ya sarba big+h+nAM ban+d+ha hUM phaT/_ces brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas pas/_g.yon pa khu tshur gyis bzung ste/_g.yas pa rdo rje tho bas dbus dang gru bzhir brdung ngo /_/d+ha ma d+ha ma/_da ma da mas na tsun+d+ha ya tsan tsur+Na ya badzra ut+ma ka ra hUM phaT/_rdo rje tho ba lan brgya rtsa brgyad
[\[36b.7\]]bzlas la brdung bar bya'o/_/de nas rdo rje go cha bskon/_/rdo rje'i rtse mo bzlas pa'i spos chus byugs la gur gum dang /_a ka ru dang /_du ruSh+ka dang /_tsan+dan dang ga bur dang gla rtsi la sogs pa'i dri rnams kyis sngags gdab pa'i lha'i grangs dang mnyam pa'i dri'i thig le zlum po
[\[37a\]]
[\[37a.1\]]byas la der me tog gi tshom bu la sngags bzlas te dam tshig sems dpa' bskyed la/_nam mkha'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dgug pa dang gzhug pa la sogs pa byas la mchod pa'i bye brag sna tshogs pas mchod la/_bstod pa byas gsol ba gdab
[\[37a.2\]]ste/_hUM bcom ldan 'jam dpal rdo rje ni/_/rig sngags rgyal po phyag 'tshal bstod/_/snying rje'i yid kyis dkyil 'khor bri bar 'dod/_/de bas byin brlabs mdzad par gsol/_/dgongs shig sangs rgyas sde dang tshogs/_/gang gzhan sngags kyi lha tshogs dang /_/_
[\[37a.3\]]lha rnams bstan la mngon dga' ba/_/dkyil 'khor byin rlob dngos grub stsol/_/zhes lan gsum du'o/_/de nas dngul lam gser gyi bum pa la kha dog dkar por bsgyur la/_lha'i grangs dang mnyam pa'am/_yang na rnam par rgyal ba'i bum pa'am las thams cad
[\[37a.4\]]pa'i bum pa ste/_las kyi bum pa la sna tshogs rdo rje bri'o/_/rnam par rgyal ba'i bum pa la lha kun gyi mtshan ma dang /_gtso bo'i mtshan ma bri'o/_/gtso bo'i bum par sman lnga dang 'bru lngas bkang la mgul chings nyis rim du bya'o/_/me tog gi phreng ba dang gdugs dkar po re
[\[37a.5\]]res g.yogs par bya'o/_/yang na bum pa bcu dgod zer te 'thad do/_/gtso bo'i bum par gong gi gsum las lha tshang bar bskyed la/_dgug gzhug dang mchod bstod dang bzlas pa bya'o/_/las kyi bum par rdo rje gnod sbyin du bskyed pa dang gzhug pa dang /_mchod
[\[37a.6\]]bstod dang bzlas pa bya'o/_/rnam rgyal bum pa ni bzhu bar bya'o/_/las bum ni mi bzhu'o/_/yang na kun mi bzhu zer te/_de nas bum pa rnams gtsang sar sba'o/_/bum pa lhag par gnas pa'o/_/de nas bar chad thams cad zhi ba dang /_dngos grub thams
[\[37a.7\]]cad bsgrub pa'i phyir/_gzhung bzhin du sbyin sreg bya/_de nas phyi rol du gtor ma btang ste/_lha la mchod pa slob ma sta gon du gzhug pa bya ste/_shar ngos su maN+Dal byas pa'i rtsar 'dug ste/_bla ma la gsol ba gdab ste/_ston pa khyod la bdag dga'o/_/byang chub
[\[37b\]]
[\[37b.1\]]sems dpa'i tshul bstan pa/_/mgon po chen po bdag 'tshal lo/_/de nyid dam tshig rig pa dang /_/byang chub sems kyang bdag la gsol/_/thar pa chen po'i grong mchog tu/_/mgon po bdag ni 'jug par mdzod/_/de nas bla mas/_rtog pa rnams ni legs
[\[37b.2\]]par bsdus pa yis/_/shin tu bsam pa bzang por ldan pas nyon/_/brjed ngas blo la 'jam pa'i dbyangs sogs rnams/_/bde bar gshegs pa rnams kyis byin mi rlob/_/bag med bdag gis mi dge bgyis pa dang /_/bgyid stsal rjes su yi rang gang yin pa/_/de
[\[37b.3\]]dag thams cad byang chub mchog gi ni/_/spyan sngar ma lus da ltar so sor bshags/_/bde gshegs sras kyi tshogs gnyis zab pa dang /_/rgya che 'gro ba ma lus pa yi don/_/sgrub par byed pa de las gzhan pa la/_/rtag tu bdag ni rjes su yi rang ngo /_/thugs rjes
[\[37b.4\]]khyab pa'i thugs dang ldan gyur pa/_/blo gros sdig bral gti mug tshogs kun bcom/_/ma lus pad+ma'i rigs kyi nang bzhugs pa/_/bde bar gshegs pa rnams la skyabs su mchi/_/blo mchog rnams kyi kun dga' ra ba ste/_/dman pas 'jigs pa rnams kyi
[\[37b.5\]]skyabs byed 'tshal/_/srid pa'i sbyor ba zil gyis mnan pa'i mchog/_/gsung mchog chos la bdag ni skyabs su mchi/_/'dod chags la sogs sbrul gyi dug bcom zhing /_/blo gros rnam rgyal thugs rjer ldan pa yi/_/brtul zhugs bzang po'i tshogs la skyabs su
[\[37b.6\]]mchi/_/srid dang bral ba rnams la bdag phyag 'tshal/_/rgyu yi rjes la bdag po'i lus bdag nyid/_/'bras bu'i stobs kyis dag las rgyal 'gyur ba/_/snying rje'i rtsa ba zug cing yang dag rtogs/_/mnyam med byang chub bdag gis gzung bar bgyi/_/de nas slob
[\[37b.7\]]ma'i gnas gsum du dri'i thig le byas la/_rdo rje dang 'khor lo dang pad+ma dang /_oM AHhUM gis bskyed de gzhag go/_/de nas spos dang me tog la sogs pa re re byin la/_de nas brtsams te bde ba thams cad nye bar gnas par gyis shig ces brjod do/_/da nas so shing me
[\[38a\]]
[\[38a.1\]]tog gi phreng bas bdud rtsi 'khyil pa'i sngags bzlas te byin la/_slob ma rang gi so brud maN+Dal gyi steng du bor te/_ltas lta ba so shing mdun drang por bor la/_de tshe bdag la lta ba dang /_/rtse mo gyen du 'dren gyur na/_/de tshe dngos grub mchog thob 'gyur/_/_
[\[38a.2\]]de tshe shar du kha bltas na/_/de tshe dngos grub 'bring du 'gyur/_/mtshams dang byang du kha bltas na/_/'jig rten pa yi dngos grub thob/_/so shing bor ba rgya zhig la/_/thur du bltas nas sa 'og go/_/de nas ku sha sar pa la rdo rje rnon po bzlas te/_stan dang sngas su sbyin
[\[38a.3\]]no/_/de nas srung skud la sngags kyi phreng ba de'i dpung pa g.yon par gdags so/_/de brtan pa'i phyir yang rje btsun gyi yi ge brgya pa yang brjod do/_/de nas zab pa dang rgya che ba'i chos kyi gzengs bstod la bzhin bzangs rnams longs shig dang /_dkyil 'khor chen po
[\[38a.4\]]mthong bar 'gyur ro/_/nang par ji lta ba'i rmi lam zlos shig brjod la btang ngo /_/de nas nang par rmi lam dri bar bya'o/_/de nas 'dzem pa med par bzlas te/_rmi lam sangs rgyas mthong ba dang /_/yon tan rgya mtsho mngon sum bzhin/_/mchod rten dang ni sku gzugs
[\[38a.5\]]mthong /_/de la mchod pa rtsom pa dang /_/dge slong dag dang chos nyan rnams/_/zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i rmi lam brtags la ngan par gyur na sbyin sreg bya/_de nas dkyil 'khor yang dag mchod pa bzlas pa dang /_bsgom pa la sogs pa ci nus par mchod bstod la
[\[38a.6\]]sogs pa byas la/_de nas sngags dang phyag rgyas dkyil 'khor steng du bteg la/_de bzhin gshegs pa de rnams dang /_shel lta bu'i khang pa brtsegs pa'i nang du zhugs par kha sbyar byas la gzhag go/_/de nas slob ma'i gtso bo dang lhan cig tu bsam gtan
[\[38a.7\]]la mnyam par nyal bar bya'o/_/de nas bdag nyid skye rengs shar ba'i dus su lha'i sbyor ba byas la/_nyi ma 'char kar bdag nyid rgyan thams cad dang ldan par byas nas/_dkyil 'khor dris nye bar byugs te/_tshon sna lnga'i skud pa so sor bkal la rim pas bzhag ste/_
[\[38b\]]
[\[38b.1\]]oM hUM trAM hrIHa rang gi sa bon rnams la mi bskyod pa la sogs pa/_rang gi phyogs na bzhugs pa rnams kyi gnas su btang la/_'bar ba'i lcags kyus drangs te/_lag pa g.yas pa'i srad bu bkal la/_a na la sogs pa'i sngags kyis bsgrims la/_tsan+dan la sogs
[\[38b.2\]]pa bsgos pa'i snod du bzhag la mchod de/_bzlas pa byas la/_de nas rang nyid rnam par snang mdzad du gyur pa'i snying ga nas/_grogs po rdo rje 'dzin la dza dza zhes pa phyung la/_ma dang Ta las nyi ma dang zla ba ser po'i snang ba bskyed la/_dza zhes pas sgrub pa'i grogs kyi lag tu
[\[38b.3\]]gtad la/_g.yon khu tshur gyis srad bu bzung la ci bder gdab par bya ste/_de yang tshangs dang logs dang zur dang logs thig rnams la/_de bzhin phyi dang nang gi cha chen po nyi shu brgyad du nam mkha' la gdab par bya'o/_/oM badzra sa ma ya sU tra ma ti kra ma hUM/_zhes
[\[38b.4\]]nga gyen du btab pa'i sgras de bzhin gshegs pa rnams bskul/_yang na cha chen po bcu drug tu bya/_de nas kha dog gcig pa'i skud pa las thams cad pa'i skud par byin gyis brlabs la/_sa thig gdab ste/_kha cig na re rdo rje dbyings bzhin du thig gdab bo zhes zer/_
[\[38b.5\]]kha cig na re cha chen po brgyad du thig gdab bo zhes zer/_'dir ni nges pa kho nar cha chen po nyi shu rtsa brgyad du gdab bo zhes phyi nang du phye ste/_'khor lo rim pa gsum gyis gdab bo/_/phyi dang nang du bcas pa'i sgo/_/phyi 'jig rten pa'i sgo rkyang ba bya'o/_/rdo rje ra ba dang me ri la
[\[38b.6\]]sogs pa'i thig gdab bo/_/de nas dkyil 'khor na gnas pa'i phur bu hUM bzhis bton la/_tshon sna lngas bkang la/_thig bzhin du byin gyis brlabs te/_oM sa ma ya tsi tra hUM/_zhes pa 'dis sba bar bya'o/_/des byang shar mtshams su tshon sna rnams mdzub
[\[38b.7\]]gang ba lag pa g.yon pas drangs te/_chos kyi dbyings de dag pas ni/_/sems can khams ni rang grol byas/_/rgyas pas 'jam dbyangs rdo rje nyid/_/de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gnas/_/zhes brjod la phur bus gdab bo/_/de nas dbus nas rim pas
[\[39a\]]
[\[39a.1\]]bris te/_de yi rim pa 'di yin te/_/sngon po ser po dmar po dang /_/ljang gu dkar po rim pas dgye/_/de yang shar du sngo la lho ru ser/_/nub tu dmar po byang ni ljang /_/dkar po dbus su shes par bya/_/gsungs pas na de ltar bri'o/_/de
[\[39a.2\]]ltar bris la mtshan ma dgod pa ni/_sku'am gsung ngam thugs su dgod pa ste/_dbus su dpal rnam par snang mdzad do/_/'khor lo'i phyogs bzhir bde bar gshegs pa rigs bzhi'o/_/mtshams su yum bzhi'o/_/de'i phyi rol du 'khor lo rtsibs bcu drug pa grwa
[\[39a.3\]]bzhi sgo dang bcas pa'o/_/rtsibs bcu drug la byang chub sems dpa' bcu drug go/_/grwa la lha mo brgyad do/_/sgo la sgo ba bzhi'o/_/de'i phyi rol du 'jig rten pa'i yon tan brjod pa las dgod par bya'o/_/de nas dgongs ka'i dus su bab pa dang /_yo byad dang dkyil
[\[39a.4\]]'khor gyi rgyan rnams dgram par bya ste/_mchod pa lnga dang rgyan thams cad dang /_de bzhin du phur pa dang mda' dang /_tshon skud kyi dra ba dang /_ral gri la sogs pa dang me long la sogs pas dkyil 'khor brgyan pa/_mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i glegs bam bzhi
[\[39a.5\]]yang phyogs bzhir gzhag go/_/phyogs mtshams su spos snod brgyad la sogs pas bdug par bya'o/_/de ltar dkyil 'khor gyi rgyan cha zin nas/_de nas rje btsun gyi yi ge brgya pa zlos shing /_dkyil 'khor de dbang ldan nas brtsams te bsang gtor bya'o/_/dkyil
[\[39a.6\]]'khor byin gyis brlab pa'i phyir/_rdo rje 'khor lo'i phyag rgya dang sngags bzlas so/_/de nas bdag nyid rgyan gyis brgyan pa khyams su 'dug ste/_dang por bdag med pa nas sgrub pa'i thabs las 'byung ba bzhin du/_gtso bo'i sku bskyed cing ye shes sems dpa' dang
[\[39a.7\]]gnyis su med par byas la rgyas gdab ste/_dbang bskur la dkyil 'khor de sngags dang phyag rgyas blang ba la/_sku dang yig 'bru phyag mtshan gang yin pa'i cho ga gsum gyis bskyed la/_kha sbyar gyi sbyor ba bsams la phab ste gnyis su med par bya'o/_/de nas bdag
[\[39b\]]
[\[39b.1\]]nyid dkyil 'khor lan gsum du bskor zhing lhag pa dang ma tshang ba zhi bar bya ba'i phyir/_rje btsun gyi mtshan yang dag par brjod pa dang /_sngags kyi phreng ba brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas la me tog dbul lo/_/de nas rdo rje 'jigs byed du byas la dbus su 'dug nas sgo dbye'o/_/yang
[\[39b.2\]]na bar 'dir lha'i rnal 'byor byas la/_bum pa dang yo byad rnams nang du gzhug go/_/bum pa rnams la bzlas pa byas la gnas su gzhag go/_/de nas mchod pa byas la bdag nyid dbang dang dam tshig can du bya ba'i phyir/_rje btsun gyis mchod pa byas pas dbang dang /_
[\[39b.3\]]dam tshig dang ldan par bsam mo/_/de nas mchod pa la sogs pa byin gyis brlabs la/_de nas sgo phye la sangs rgyas rnams spyan drangs la/_nam mkha' la byon pa la bgegs bskrad pa la sogs pa byas la dgug gzhug bya ste/_rgyas gdab pa dang dbang bskur ba dang mchod
[\[39b.4\]]yon la sogs pa phul la/_mchod pa lnga dang nyi shu la sogs pas mchod la/_rje btsun gyi mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pas bstod do/_/rje btsun gyi sngags kyi phreng ba brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas pa la/_gsol ba btab la de nas 'byung po dang chos skyong rnams la gzhung nas 'byung ba bzhin du
[\[39b.5\]]gtor ma byin la/_de nas dkyil 'khor gyi 'gram du sbyin sreg rgyas par bya'o/_/dus 'di ru phyag rgya dang glu la sogs pa bya'o/_/de nas lha la phyag byas la/_bdag ming 'di zhes bya ba yi/_/rdo rje slob dpon dka' thub che/_/sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir/_/slob ma
[\[39b.6\]]rnams ni 'jug par bgyi/_/de nas gang zag gi rim pas zhu phul la bslab pa'i gzhi lnga dang ldan pa'i slob ma gang yang rung ba'i rgyan dang ldan par bya ste/_yol ba'i phyi rol du bla ma la gsol ba gdab bo/_/dga' chen khyod bdag ston pa bas/_/slob dpon khyod ni dgongs su
[\[39b.7\]]gsol/_/byang chub sems dpa'i tshul bstan pa/_/mgon po chen po bdag 'tshal lo/_/dam tshig de nyid stsal du gsol/_/sdom pa rnams kyang bdag la gsol/_/de nas slob ma la/_rdo rje bsrung ba bzlas pa yis/_/stod g.yogs smad g.yogs bskon byas
[\[40a\]]
[\[40a.1\]]la/_/sgo srung gi sngags bzlas la g.yogs te/_me tog thogs te phyag bzhi 'tshal/_/bshags dang rjes su yi rang dang /_/bskul ba dang ni gsol ba bya/_/slob dpon 'dod na 'di skad brjod/_/gtso bo bdag la sdom pa gsol/_/thub pa
[\[40a.2\]]nyi ma ma lus pa/_/sangs rgyas rnams ni bdag la gsol/_/bdag ming 'di zhes bya ba yi/_/slob dpon dpang du gnas pa la/_/sangs rgyas rol mo las byung ba/_/mi ldog pa yi 'khor lo 'byor/_/thar pa'i rang bzhin grong khyer che/_/gsang ba chen por 'jug
[\[40a.3\]]par bgyi/_/gsang ba thams cad bsdus par ni/_/slob dpon chen po bdag 'jug 'gyur/_/mi ldog pa yi dbang bskur ba/_/skal ba chen po bdag la gsol/_/mtshan rnams kun gyis rgyas btab cing /_/dpe byad rnams dang yang dag ldan/_/sangs rgyas kun gyi
[\[40a.4\]]yid 'ong ma/_/slob dpon chen po bdag la gsol/_/dbang chen po ni rmad byung ba/_/sems can kun gyi don gyi phyir/_/bdag ni rtag tu slob dpon 'gyur/_/slob dpon chen po bdag la gsol/_/de nas bla mas lha rnams la/_che ge zhes bya 'di nyid ni/_/byang
[\[40a.5\]]chub chen po 'di nyid ni/_/dam tshig mchog dang gsang ba yi/_/dkyil 'khor 'dir ni 'jug par 'tshal/_/yang ni bla mas 'di skad brjod/_/gsang ba chen po'i rigs pa yi/_/gsang ba yongs su 'dzin pa ni/_/bdag nyid chen po khyod 'dod dam/_/de yang 'tshal
[\[40a.6\]]zhes brjod par bya/_/de nas bla mas 'di skad brjod/_/sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun te/_/dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su song /_/'di ni sangs rgyas rigs dag la/_/dam tshig brtan par gyur pa'o/_/rdo rje dril bu phyag rgya yang /_/blo chen khyod kyis gzung bar
[\[40a.7\]]gyis/_/byang chub sems gang rdo rje che/_/shes rab dril bu zhes bshad do/_/slob dpon dag kyang gzung bar bgyi/_/bla ma sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam/_/'di ni rdo rje'i rigs dag pa'i/_/sdom pa dam tshig yin par gsungs/_/rin chen rigs mchog chen po la/_/_
[\[40b\]]
[\[40b.1\]]nyin dang mtshan mo lan gsum du/_/zang zing mi 'jigs chos dang byams/_/sbyin pa rnam bzhi rtag tu sbyin/_/phyi nang gsang ba'i theg pa gsum/_/dam chos khyod kyis gzung bar bya/_/'di ni pad+ma'i rigs dag pa'i/_/dam tshig sdom pa yin par gsungs/_/las
[\[40b.2\]]kyi rigs mchog chen po la/_/sdom pa thams cad ldan par ni/_/yang dag nyid du gzung bar bgyi/_/mchod pa'i las kyang ci nus bgyi/_/gzhan yang bcu bzhi 'di dag ni/_/phas pham par ni rab tu bshad/_/spang zhing dor bar mi bya'o/_/rtsa ba'i ltung bar shes par
[\[40b.3\]]bya/_/nyin dang mtshan mo lan gsum du/_/nyin re bzhin du bzlas par bya/_/gal te nyams na rnal 'byor pa/_/kha na ma tho sbom por 'gyur/_/khyod kyis srog chags gsad mi bya/_/ma byin par yang blang mi bya/_/'dod pas log par mi spyod cing /_/brdzun du
[\[40b.4\]]smra bar mi bya'o/_/phung khrol kun gyi rtsa ba ni/_/chang ni yang dag spang bar bya/_/sems can gdul phyir ma gtogs par/_/bya ba ma yin thams cad spang /_/dam pa nye bar bsten bya zhing /_/rnal 'byor pa rnams bsnyen bkur bya/_/lus kyi las ni rnam gsum
[\[40b.5\]]dang /_/ngag gi rnam pa bzhi dag dang /_/yid kyi rnam pa gsum dag ni/_/ci nus par ni rjes su skyong /_/theg pa dman pa 'dod mi bya/_/'khor ba dag kyang yongs mi spang /_/rtag tu mya ngan 'das mi chags/_/lha dang lha min gsang ba la/_/khyod kyis brnyas par mi bya'o/_/phyag
[\[40b.6\]]rgya bzhon pa mtshon cha dag_/mtshan ma bgom par mi bya'o/_/'di dag dam tshig yin par bshad/_/khyod kyis rtag tu bsrung bar bya/_/des/_slob dpon 'dir ni bdag la gsol/_/gtso bos ji ltar bka' stsal ba/_/de dag bdag ni bgyid par 'tshal/_/de nas
[\[40b.7\]]sdom pa gzung bar brjod/_/sdom pa mi 'dod gang zag la/_/'jug pa tsam zhig ni bya'o/_/dbang bskur ba ni mi bya'o/_/bo d+hi tsit+ta ut+pA da ya mi/_/byang chub sems ni bla med pa/_/dam pa bdag gis bskyed nas su/_/de yi snying gar snying pos ni/_/rdo rje rab tu gzhag par bya/_/_
[\[41a\]]
[\[41a.1\]]su ra te sa ma ya s+t+waM ho badzra sid+d+hi ya thA su khaM/_dang po'i sangs rgyas byin gyis rlobs/_/mchod pas mchod de yon blangs nas/_/las kyi bum pas dbang bskur ro/_/sems mas bcings te sgo bzhir gzhug_/de nas shar sgor 'dug byas la/_/dus 'di
[\[41a.2\]]nyid du khyod nyid ni/_/sangs rgyas rigs su chud pas na/_/nga yi rdo rje ye shes sbyin/_/sangs rgyas rigs su 'grub par gsungs/_/gang zhig 'di nyid ma mthong ba'i/_/mdun du smra bar ma byed cig_/bag med smras na nyams par 'gyur/_/de bas nan tan smra bar bya'o/_/_
[\[41a.3\]]snying gar rdo rje gtugs la smra'o/_/de nas rdo rje mgor bzhag la/_/'di ni khyod kyi dam tshig ste/_/'ga' la smras na glad pa 'gas/_/tsan+dan gur gum la sogs pa'i/_/mna' chu byin la 'di skad brjod/_/'di ni khyod kyi dmyal ba'i chu/_/dam tshig 'das na sreg par
[\[41a.4\]]byed/_/dam tshig bsrungs na dngos grub 'grub/_/'thung zhig rdo rje'i chu la 'thung /_/oM badzra ya tha hUM/_mna' bor ro/_/de nas 'di skad smras te/_dus 'di nyid nas bu khyod kyi/_/rdo rje 'dzin pa nga yin gyis/_/nga yis ji ltar bka' stsal te/_/khyod kyis skyo ba med par
[\[41a.5\]]gyis/_/gang yang nga la ma mos min/_/de bzhin mos par ma byas na/_/bdud kyis bcom nas myos par 'gro/_/de bas dam tshig gnas par gyis/_/de nas/_yi ge brgya pa mnyam gzhag bstan byas la/_/bdag lus gang yin snod kyi sgo phye ste/_/snying la gnas
[\[41a.6\]]pa'i rdo rje'i dbus su blta/_/sngags kyi bdag po yi ge a gzugs dmar/_/brjod pas yang dag pas g.yo ba lta bu'i/_/slob ma'i lus 'di sgo nas dbye bar bya/_/zhugs nas rdo rje byams pa'i snying la gnas/_/ma lus kun la kun du gang nas su/_/rkang pa g.yon pas g.yas pa
[\[41a.7\]]mnan nas su/_/sngags pas slob ma'i rkang pa de la dbab/_/kun du dril bu'i sgras ni yang dag dkrol/_/lag pa pad+ma 'dab ma'i phyag rgya bca'/_/mi bskyod rin chen la sogs bde gshegs rnams/_/rang gi phyogs rtogs las byung 'di phab pas/_/legs
[\[41b\]]
[\[41b.1\]]phab gyur bar rang nyid lus la blta/_/gang zhig des kyang babs par ma gyur na/_/lag pa g.yas pas til gyi sa bon gzhag_/dbus su yi ge hUM yang rnam bkod do/_/rdo rje 'od 'bar bar ni rnam par bsam/_/g.yon pa'i mtheb mdzub phyag rgyar bcas pa yi/_/_
[\[41b.2\]]bslang bar byas la sdig pa bsreg par bya/_/lus ni thal bar byas pa rnam dag pa/_/bsod nams lus la sngags kyis dgang /_/ye shes dbab pa nyid du bsam/_/rdzas bzhin dbab pa nyid du rab tu 'gyur/_/de nas babs par gyur pa dang /_/sku gsung thugs
[\[41b.3\]]kyi rtags gsum 'byung /_/gar dang gar gyi lan dang ni/_/glu dang glu len yang dag bya/_/brtan par byas la 'di skad brjod/_/'di ltar bdag gi slob ma 'di/_/dkyil 'khor du ni legs btsud nas/_/lha yi rigs kyi rim pa dang /_/'di yi bsod nams ci 'dra

[\[123a.1\]]rang gi ngo bor gyur par yang dag par rtogs pa'i phyir ro/_/de lta bu yin du zin kyang gnyis kyi tshul can te zhes bya ba ste/_brdzun yin du zin kyang gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i tshul du so sor snang ba'i phyir/_de ni mi bden pa yin/_glo bur gyi 'khrul pa can
